item.title: What Iâ€™m doing now
item.description: Life is a hectic affair; To help keep me sane and to give me some guidance, these are my current areas of focus: Photography Improving my photography, with my new(ish) toy Work Continuing to promote and improve both of the guilds I&lsqo;ve setup – the IDG & the FE guild Devoting time out to meetup regularly with my mentor(s) for a coffee Making a better effort to attend more local industry events & meetups such as NUX, UX&D as well as the great events being run within Auto Trader Reading Taking part in GoodRead’s reading challenge.
